bill.title: Mississippi Stroke Registry Act and Stroke Task Force; establish.
bill.description: An Act Entitled "the Mississippi Stroke Registry Act"; To Provide Legislative Intent Relating To Care Of Stroke Patients; To Authorize And Direct The State Department Of Health To Establish A Stroke Task Force And To Authorize The Task Force To Receive Pertinent Data On Stroke Patients; To Provide For Annual Reports To The Legislature; To Provide For Confidentiality Of Patient Medical Records; To Provide Immunity From Civil Or Criminal Liability For Furnishing Information To The Task Force; To Provide Criminal Penalties For Misuse Of Information; And For Related Purposes.

step.action: Referred To Public Health and Welfare;Appropriations
